title: Russia-Ukraine war: What happened today (June 7)
content:
1. Russia-Ukraine war: What happened today (June 7)  NPR
  2. Ukraine retakes parts of Severodonetsk amid brutal street fighting; World Bank slashes global growth forecast  CNBC
  3. Your Monday Evening Briefing  The New York Times
  4. In Russia’s Battle for East Ukraine, Both Sides Have Higher Stakes at Play  The Wall Street Journal
  5. Zelenskiy: 'Every chance' to fight back in Sievierodonetsk  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
